info.title: Material Documents - Read, Create
info.description: This service enables you to retrieve and create material documents, for example, to post a goods receipt for a purchase order or to document the transfer of materials between two storage locations. Additionally, the service allows you to cancel existing material documents or single items. It can be consumed by external systems and user interfaces.

x-sap-shortText: Use this synchronous inbound service to read and create material documents

x-sap-extensible.description:
API can be extended by custom fields on the following business contexts (field usage for this API needs to be selected):
* Accounting: Coding Block (FINS_CODING_BLOCK)
* Material Document Item (MATERIALDOCUMENTITEM)

[How to add an extension field to an API](https://help.sap.com/docs/SAP_S4HANA_CLOUD/0f69f8fb28ac4bf48d2b57b9637e81fa/ce819b8557194ae0aa180ba4ac6a04de.html)

get.summary: Reads information on material document header level
get.description: Reads material document header information to get an overview of the material document postings.

parameters.description: Filter items by property values, see [Filtering](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=64)

post.description: Creates a material document compost by header and item for a specific business process.

count.description: The number of entities in the collection. Available when using the [$inlinecount](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=67) query option.
